description: Looking for fresh easy dinner ideas that the whole family will love? Try succulent char siu pork lettuce cups for a flavour-packed dinner in a flash.
name: Easy Char Siu Pork Lettuce Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths COOK Chinese bbq char siu style pork strips

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook pork, in batches, for 7 minutes or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, prepare rice according to packet instructions.
Prepare salad according to packet instructions. Arrange 16 lettuce leaves on a serving plates.
Spoon rice into lettuce leaves. Top with salad and pork. Serve.
